title: Was Fox News Removed From ‘Armed Forces Radio’ Over Vindman Segment?
subtitle: Fox News was criticized for a segment on Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman's testimony during the impeachment inquiry into U.S. President Donald Trump.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Fox News was removed from 'Armed Forces Radio' due to the network's coverage of Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman's testimony in the impeachment inquiry into U.S. President Donald Trump.
